title: Red Hot Chili Samurai Vol. 1
description: Kokaku is a flashy, know-it-all samurai. He may seem lazy, but when it comes to bad guys, he has no mercy! He'll do whatever it takes, especially when his one life's passion - chili peppers - is at stake. Fasten your robe belts, this fire-breathing manga is action packed and won't let go!
author: Yoshitsugu Katagiri
